name: ChimeraCreator
0:
”Alexa, ask Chimera Creator to make an animal”
”Alexa, ask Chimera Creator to get me an animal”
”Alexa, ask Chimera Creator to spell that animal”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: chimera creator
Developer Terms of Use
des: Combining the best animals that mother nature has to offer, Chimera Creator suggests magical new animals names for you! Ask for animal names, or ask to repeat or spell names you just heard. Great for inspiration if you're looking for a new creature to draw or you're trying to find that new spirit animal that describes your spirit best.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
